feed.title: A design for Probabilistic Partial Pruning

entry.title: A design for Probabilistic Partial Pruning
entry.summary: In a discussion thread on the Bitcoin development mailing list, David A. Harding shared two useful emails. The first email includes links to discussions prior to 2017 regarding a potential DoS risk that is more significant than the fingerprinting risk mentioned in a previous reply. The second email describes a possible method for distributing data with fewer DoS risks and less severe fingerprinting than nodes storing different sets of blocks.
